snippet: A Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for a decade has been indicted on 329 charges that include kidnapping and rape, prosecutors said.
abstract: Ariel Castro, Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for a decade, is indicted on 329 charges that include kidnapping, rape and aggravated murder.
lead_paragraph: A Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for a decade has been indicted on 329 charges that include kidnapping and rape, prosecutors said.

headline.main: Ohio: Suspect Indicted in Cleveland Abduction Case
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Suspect Indicted In Cleveland Abduction Case
